DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the SECURE Study is to actively gather additional information on the use of the CorMatrix® CanGaroo ECM® Envelope in a post market observational study.
DOC.brief_title: A Post Market Study on the Use of Cormatrix® Cangaroo ECM® (Extracellular Matrix) Envelope
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have received CorMatrix® CanGaroo ECM® Envelope for an implantable electronic device placement.
